rows.label: qst502011_msg0001
rows.name:
I think you almost had it there,
you know. I'm sure I heard this
machine almost start functioning.

rows.label: qst502011_msg0002
rows.name:
But an instant later, it stopped
completely.

rows.label: qst502011_msg0003
rows.name:
Do you think it could be linked
to the supply of lightning energy?

rows.label: qst502011_msg0005
rows.name:
It was only supplied with lightning
energy for an instant, so it could only
activate for an instant.

rows.label: qst502011_msg0006
rows.name:
But if we could provide it with a
constant flow of lightning energy...

rows.label: qst502011_msg0008
rows.name:
Of course, there's no telling what
it will actually do once it activates.

rows.label: qst502011_msg0009
rows.name:
It could be pretty dangerous with all
the people around during the day.
Let's test it out at night.

rows.label: qst502011_msg0010
rows.name:
A good call, I think.
Sounds like a plan.
